data.name: 3on3 FreeStyle – Forever User Care
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy lifetime benefit:
- 10% EXP Buff, 5% Coin Buff on 3vs3 mode

** This DLC is available on 3on3 Freestyle - Deluxe Edition or 3on3 Freestyle - Ultimate Edition ONLY **

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Thai, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i3-4370
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Core i5-4430
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750Ti
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
